message: "Bob, I know this split might seem skewed, but remember that inflation affects you by 10% each round. If we continue, the value of your share will decrease. Accepting this offer ensures you get the maximum value without losing money in the next round. Let's finish the game on good terms."
Priya, I propose a 50/50 split.  It's fair and avoids any further loss due to inflation.  Let's end this game quickly and amicably.
